评论概述: Super cute, but has an uncomfortable seam
评论详情: It looks great and I love the thumb holes but unfortunately it has a seam just under the boob area that can shifts upward when you move, so you can't wear it without a bra and expect it to be comfy. I had kinda wanted it for around the house, but at least it's nice for going out.
Cosplay or just into a bit of dramatic fashion, this lightweight holder shirt fits the bill.

I love the way this blouse fits! It's a heavier knit that will be perfect in fall and winter. One of my favorite features are the thumb holes in the sleeves! It looks good and feels good and I can't wait for the weather to cool down so I can wear it often!
This shirt is so cool. it's like a hoodie/sweatshirt/tunic combined. Very soft and surprisingly light material. Will be great for cooler fall weather. LOVE the thumb holes. Fits true to size

评论概述: Not as cute as the images show, but not bad
评论详情: I got this for my high school aged daughter, and when I got it I was disappointed because it's not quite as cute as it seems in the images.  The fabric is thick and stretchy, like a sweatshirt would be.My daughter loves it, and will definitely wear it to school, I just think they could have made the transition seams that go from one color to another a little better, so it'd look like the second color was a separate shirt worn under the first color.  It's not like that at all, just straight across seams that look cheap and quick.
